rdgGrp.rdg: full of activity and spirit. He is desirous to be a true Swiss, and to enter into foreign service;<pb xml:id="F1831_v_066" n="50"/> but we cannot part with him, at least until his elder brother return to us. My uncle is not pleased with the idea of a military career in a distant country; but Ernest never had your powers of application. He looks upon study as an odious fetter;—his time is spent

has <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0058__main__d2e12253"/>quite<del eID="c56-0058__main__d2e12253"/> lost that<lb n="c56-0059__main__1"/> sickly appearance that he had <lb n="c56-0059__main__2"/> some years ago –
has lost that sickly appearance which he had some years ago;
